verbose_text: After treatment with exogenous GDF11 protein, we found that the autophagy level in myocardium and H9c2 cells was significantly increased by IR or HR insults, as evidenced by the increased level of autophagosomes number, high ratio of LC3B / LC3A and increased levels of Beclin1 expression.
evidence: autophagy level in myocardium and H9c2 cells was significantly increased by IR or HR
